title: Implement Project Board Dashboard
description: Implement a real-time project board dashboard for The Chain development team using Flutter Web with agent statuses, project metrics, activity logs, and system health
acceptance_criteria: Responsive design for all screen sizes

technical_notes.performance_requirements: Initial Load < 2s, WebSocket Latency < 100ms, UI Update at 60 FPS, Memory < 150MB, CPU < 30% idle
technical_notes.security_considerations: WebSocket authentication, secure token handling, XSS prevention
